entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:36 a.m. MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow late this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
